parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Assuredly, certainly. A stronger form of men; a particle of affirmation; assuredly.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (lit: I speak well of) I bless; pass: I am blessed. From a compound of eu and logos; to speak well of, i.e. to bless.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To increase, multiply. From another form of plethos; to increase.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
